abstract: In an interview this weekend, Mr. Paul said he had no idea what the training exercise — known as Jade Helm — was when he was first asked about it last month on an Iowa radio program.

headline.main: Rand Paul Plays Down Comments on Military Exercise After Mockery

snippet: In an interview this weekend, Mr. Paul said he had no idea what the training exercise — known as Jade Helm — was when he was first asked about it last month on an Iowa radio program.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
